ygData.subject: Re: bandages
ygData.msgSnippet: es you will have to put some points into the bind wound skill.  One or two is enough.  At first you wont see much healing done per bandage but as your skill
ygData.messageBody:
es you will have to put some points into the bind
wound skill. One or two is enough. At first you wont
see much healing done per bandage but as your skill
increase, you will heal more damage and use fewer
bandages. I'm not sure where the amount healed per
bandage tops out, I have heard 25 poits per bandage
but I dont know that for sure. They are kind of
expensive to buy at ove 5 sp each and I generally buy
them 30 at a time. If you are poor, try to find a
cleric or mage and get them to summon some for you. I
go around healing eveyone that will let me. It's a
good way to make friends and to increase my skill.
It's at 44 now and has a long way to go to max
out..I'm almost lvl 14 now.
